trans-unit.source: Welcome to Executive Portal

seg-source.mrk: Welcome to Executive Portal

target.mrk: Welcome to Executive Portal

trans-unit.source: The Executive Portal is a web based application designed specifically for top level management to organize and view multichannel and multi-measure information provided by ForeSee.

seg-source.mrk: The Executive Portal is a web based application designed specifically for top level management to organize and view multichannel and multi-measure information provided by ForeSee.

target.mrk: The Executive Portal is a web based application designed specifically for top level management to organize and view multichannel and multi-measure information provided by ForeSee.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished through customizable dashboards which present your data in a variety of interactive graphics that clearly identify important outliers for decision makers. These graphics also enable you to drill down into data with a single click.

seg-source.mrk: This is accomplished through customizable dashboards which present your data in a variety of interactive graphics that clearly identify important outliers for decision makers.
These graphics also enable you to drill down into data with a single click.

target.mrk: This is accomplished through customizable dashboards which present your data in a variety of interactive graphics that clearly identify important outliers for decision makers.
These graphics also enable you to drill down into data with a single click.

trans-unit.source: Dashboard Viewer

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard Viewer

target.mrk: Dashboard Viewer

trans-unit.source: Dashboard Creator

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard Creator

target.mrk: Dashboard Creator

trans-unit.source: Dashboard Viewer - The consumer or recipient of dashboards who analyzes the charts, grids, and Open Ends.

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard Viewer - The consumer or recipient of dashboards who analyzes the charts, grids, and Open Ends.

target.mrk: Dashboard Viewer - The consumer or recipient of dashboards who analyzes the charts, grids, and Open Ends.

trans-unit.source: Dashboard Creator - Develops and arranges customized tiles into dashboards for the purpose of presenting data.

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard Creator - Develops and arranges customized tiles into dashboards for the purpose of presenting data.

target.mrk: Dashboard Creator - Develops and arranges customized tiles into dashboards for the purpose of presenting data.

trans-unit.source: Information on using this Help feature.

seg-source.mrk: Information on using this Help feature.

target.mrk: Information on using this Help feature.

trans-unit.source: Executive Portal Help may be viewed at any time during your login session by clicking Help at the top of the web page.

seg-source.mrk: Executive Portal Help may be viewed at any time during your login session by clicking Help at the top of the web page.

target.mrk: Executive Portal Help may be viewed at any time during your login session by clicking Help at the top of the web page.

trans-unit.source: Drop-down Text

seg-source.mrk: Drop-down Text

target.mrk: Drop-down Text

trans-unit.source: Some topics may show links like this:

seg-source.mrk: Some topics may show links like this:

target.mrk: Some topics may show links like this:

trans-unit.source: Click to view something important...

seg-source.mrk: Click to view something important...

target.mrk: Click to view something important...

trans-unit.source: Click the link again to close this section of text. Generally, the drop-down text feature is used for topics with several paragraphs or multiple step-by-step procedures to offer access to desired information quickly without having to scroll down the page. Drop-down text is expanded (opened) automatically when you print a topic.

seg-source.mrk: Click the link again to close this section of text.

Generally, the drop-down text feature is used for topics with several paragraphs or multiple step-by-step procedures to offer access to desired information quickly without having to scroll down the page.
Drop-down text is expanded (opened) automatically when you print a topic.

target.mrk: Click the link again to close this section of text.

Generally, the drop-down text feature is used for topics with several paragraphs or multiple step-by-step procedures to offer access to desired information quickly without having to scroll down the page.
Drop-down text is expanded (opened) automatically when you print a topic.

trans-unit.source: Labels and Actions

seg-source.mrk: Labels and Actions

target.mrk: Labels and Actions

trans-unit.source: As you view Executive Portal Help you may notice items in bold and bold-italic. This is to help you identify Labels, such as a text field label, and Actions, as in a graphical user interface button or link.

seg-source.mrk: As you view Executive Portal Help you may notice items in bold and bold-italic.
This is to help you identify Labels, such as a text field label, and Actions, as in a graphical user interface button or link.

target.mrk: As you view Executive Portal Help you may notice items in bold and bold-italic.
This is to help you identify Labels, such as a text field label, and Actions, as in a graphical user interface button or link.

trans-unit.source: Click the ForeSee logo to display the ForeSee web page in a new tab.

seg-source.mrk: Click the ForeSee logo to display the ForeSee web page in a new tab.

target.mrk: Click the ForeSee logo to display the ForeSee web page in a new tab.

trans-unit.source: Show or hide the left sidebar, which contains the Table of Contents, Search, and Index for Help.

seg-source.mrk: Show or hide the left sidebar, which contains the Table of Contents, Search, and Index for Help.

target.mrk: Show or hide the left sidebar, which contains the Table of Contents, Search, and Index for Help.

trans-unit.source: Previous

seg-source.mrk: Previous

target.mrk: Previous

trans-unit.source: Step backwards through the Table of Contents to view each topic in reverse order (not to be confused with the Back button of your web browser).

seg-source.mrk: Step backwards through the Table of Contents to view each topic in reverse order (not to be confused with the Back button of your web browser).

target.mrk: Step backwards through the Table of Contents to view each topic in reverse order (not to be confused with the Back button of your web browser).

trans-unit.source: Next

seg-source.mrk: Next

target.mrk: Next

trans-unit.source: Step through the Table of Contents to view each topic sequentially as you would when reading a book.

seg-source.mrk: Step through the Table of Contents to view each topic sequentially as you would when reading a book.

target.mrk: Step through the Table of Contents to view each topic sequentially as you would when reading a book.

trans-unit.source: TOC

seg-source.mrk: TOC

target.mrk: TOC

trans-unit.source: Display the Table of Contents in the left sidebar.

seg-source.mrk: Display the Table of Contents in the left sidebar.

target.mrk: Display the Table of Contents in the left sidebar.

trans-unit.source: Search

seg-source.mrk: Search

target.mrk: Search

trans-unit.source: Display a free-form text field in the left sidebar to enter all or part of a specific word. You can also enter word strings in quotations, e.g., "Open Ends". The corresponding Search button returns all topics containing your entry. Click on each topic to view the page with your search criteria highlighted.

seg-source.mrk: Display a free-form text field in the left sidebar to enter all or part of a specific word.
You can also enter word strings in quotations, e.g., "Open Ends".
The corresponding Search button returns all topics containing your entry.
Click on each topic to view the page with your search criteria highlighted.

target.mrk: Display a free-form text field in the left sidebar to enter all or part of a specific word.
You can also enter word strings in quotations, e.g., "Open Ends".
The corresponding Search button returns all topics containing your entry.
Click on each topic to view the page with your search criteria highlighted.

trans-unit.source: Index

seg-source.mrk: Index

target.mrk: Index

trans-unit.source: Display a list of terms which are linked to topics containing the most descriptive information the term.

seg-source.mrk: Display a list of terms which are linked to topics containing the most descriptive information the term.

target.mrk: Display a list of terms which are linked to topics containing the most descriptive information the term.

trans-unit.source: Print

seg-source.mrk: Print

target.mrk: Print

trans-unit.source: Sends the current topic to your default printer. For pages with drop-down sections, all sections are expanded automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Sends the current topic to your default printer.
For pages with drop-down sections, all sections are expanded automatically.

target.mrk: Sends the current topic to your default printer.
For pages with drop-down sections, all sections are expanded automatically.
